ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded look  at t he good old da ys)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah last night all I got was Hey, how come we haven t lost that Giant yet? Did you forget to equip your drum again?  Are you still awake over there?
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah last night all I got was "Hey, how come we haven't lost that Giant yet?
Did you forget to equip your drum again? Are you still awake over there?"

Needless to say I was not amused.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:19 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded
look at t he good old da ys)


Last nights convo while group travelling:

/g Uugh...this is ponderous.
Groupie says, "Wha? This is like, 2.5x faster than usual!"
/g Uugh...you just don't know...
/sigh
Groupie says, "You can't be that much faster...not at your level."
/rofl (at %T)
(there is a pause)
Groupie says, "Are you...?"
/g After the patch, you and I will go for a run around LOIO...then you tell
me.

Hmm...was a little funnier as it happened...heh. Oh well..you get the idea.
It's a slow day at work, don't blame me! :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Olgwinn Pendragun [mailto:olgwinn@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 10:47 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] RE: RE: Why did you start a Bard (long winded look at
t he good old da ys)


Nothing was more depressing than last night with my cleric twink in SK
Penthouse... We had a bard with us that ended up getting aggroed on from
birds below. Of course you can't attack them but they can certainly attack
you. So he decides to run to the zone.

He didn't make it. His drum was useless.

<sigh>

I don't even know HOW to travel with my bard without trusting in our
blinding speed. "OK, we're going to just run through this zone, do not stop

if attacked, just keep going. We can outrun anything."


>
>There is nothing more ponderous than a High Elf cleric in full
>bronze...except maybe a bard with broken drums...
>
>Ponderous...ponderous...
>
>
